Home.title: HARD ENDURO
Home.about_description: The name comes from Ditrau city and from the organizing sports club â€“ Ditriders Motorsport. It is meant to help associate the event with the local area. The event consists of 3 days, a day of prologue and two days of riding in the mountains that combine forest roads, steep climbs, rocky tracks, etc.
